name: Floss (Despance)
description:
You are a lost-and-found office employee and you must give the right product to the right person. First, check the customer's list and registration. If they match, stamp the list and give it to the customer. Otherwise, return the list and move on to the next one. But be careful, there is a lot of trick.

Mustafa Emir Uyar - Game Developer

Beyza Nur Keskin - Game Designer
